entry.title: Welcome to the Tonatiuh++ Development Blog
entry.summary: This blog documents the ongoing development and enhancement of Tonatiuh++, an advanced solar ray tracing software for analyzing the optical behaviour of concentrating solar power systems.
entry.content:
